name: Pidgeons Are not Real
description:
Hi everyone! This is my entry for the Brackeys Jam, the theme was "its not real" which led me to remember the conspiracy theory with pidgeons being robots.

Its controlled entirely with mouse and I might look into adding touchscreen controls after the Jam.

Credits:

Background Music : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/free-music-tracks-for-games-15...

Sounds: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-sound-effects-pack-155...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/halftone-sound-effects-pack...

Font: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059

All art and coding was done by me during the Jam timeframe.
